title: Undo whatever the hell you did last hotfix.
body: My FPS says it's 80 (while it's usually around 120), but it feels like I have 25 FPS, and everything is choppy and gross.

replies.body:
We made another change to address this. Your FPS should be back to normal numbers.

Let me know if you have issues still.
I've been crashing every game between 1-4 times since the most recent patch...
It's a lot better now. Just got out of a game, and it was much smoother -- no stutters, and my FPS was back to normal numbers. I'll keep an eye on it though.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Bugcheck,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YriK1EXR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-06-15T02:54:28.558+0000)
>
> We made another change to address this. Your FPS should be back to normal numbers.
> 
> Let me know if you have issues still.

Still happenin'

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Bugcheck,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YriK1EXR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-06-15T02:54:28.558+0000)
>
> We made another change to address this. Your FPS should be back to normal numbers.
> 
> Let me know if you have issues still.

Im still having the same issues, its now worse it went 80 fps
I've been having some serious lag spikes/FPS drops too today.
Exactly, this guy described it perfectly, FIX THE GAME HOLY FCK I LITERALLY CANT PLAY IT FEELS AWFUL AND ALL OF MY FRIENDS SAY THE SAME SHT IS HAPPENING TO THEM TOO!
I had to remake my last 3 ranked matches because the game didn't even load. I fell B1 to B2 because of it.
Same issue, I thought it was just me

Not sure what happened or what you did, I spent the last nearly 24 hours not being able to get into a game... now that I finally have, it's at a dreadful 1-4 FPS the whole time. I've done everything i can via the Hextech Tool Repair in repatching/reinstalling. Still the same issues.
Same here idk what it is but I cannot connect to a game and if I make a custom game I am only getting 1-3 fps.
They added more anticheat measures.  So it probably screwed up a lot of peoples set ups.  Btw i have my fps sent to 60 and it helps.  On uncapped i can never have good ping.
